title: Font ID - Grant Thornton
content:
Can anyone ID this typeface? I am thinking it may be Univers or Arial?

 [‹ Chicago Cubs Font](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924235734/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47013 "Go to previous forum topic") [Font suggestions pls! ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924235734/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47025 "Go to next forum topic")
author: thompson

comments.content: I think this is custom lettering. The closest I can get is [Neuzeit S](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924235734/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/linotype/neuzeit_s_std_complete_vp/?sample_text=Grant%20Thornton) and [Avenir](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924235734/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/linotype/avenir_std_65_medium/?sample_text=Grant%20Thornton).

Hmm...  
“rant Thornton” might be Avenir 55. No idea where that “G” came from, but i think it looks too thin for the rest of the wordmark (and generally at odds with it).

^^^  
Avenir, Anivers, Uvenir... what i was trying to suggest is that “rant Thornton” may be set in **Univers** 55.
